subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] AudioVox Conversion [2 Attachments]
author: Snowfire Lioness
full_text:
----------MB_8CD5BA564E87EFA_1308_414FA_webmail-m027.sysops.aol.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"

 Excellent Frank, so, why don't you write to mom?=C2=A0 Better yet, go find=
 her, and let her move in with you guys, I had my mom with me till the day =
she died, took care of my grandma, and her sister too, and they lived up in=
to the late ninety's.=C2=A0 That's probably same thing I got with some of S=
teve's relatives talking over the box to me, must be his father on the othe=
r side or some one like him, that always wants Steve to "go fishing."=C2=A0=
 We can't control what they say to us, they must think we can just deliver =
messages to whomever they wish.=C2=A0 lol=C2=A0 Still, don't ya just love t=
his stuff?=C2=A0 I do. sf 

 



-----Original Message-----
From: Frank Sum=
ption <purplealiengirl@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com; RTSC@y=
ahoogroups.com
Sent: Fri, Nov 26, 2010 12:09 am
Subject: [EVP-ITC] AudioVox=
 Conversion [2 Attachments]

          =C2=A0                              =
              [Attachment(s) from Frank Sumption included below]           =
            
=C2=A0An Audiovox AM/FM/CD/Cassette I got at Good Will a coupl=
e months ago.=C2=A0 I just have the cable in to take over the tuning functi=
on, no sweep board yet, I'm manually tuing wiht a 9 volt battery and a pot.=
 
 =C2=A0
 =C2=A0The video starts out "damn it! Why you don't you write you=
r mother" Ooops, must be dad, and I do put off writting, I don't write my m=
other at all. If anyone can hear this, it might be an indication of how goo=
d manual sweep works.
  =C2=A0
 =C2=A0F-S
 
      
                 
   
  =
     
  


----------MB_8CD5BA564E87EFA_1308_414FA_webmail-m027.sysops.aol.com
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8"


<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> Excelle=
nt Frank, so, why don't you write to mom?  Better yet, go find her, an=
d let her move in with you guys, I had my mom with me till the day she died=
, took care of my grandma, and her sister too, and they lived up into the l=
ate ninety's.  That's probably same thing I got with some of Steve's r=
elatives talking over the box to me, must be his father on the other side o=
r some one like him, that always wants Steve to "go fishing."  We can'=
t control what they say to us, they must think we can just deliver messages=
 to whomever they wish.  lol  Still, don't ya just love this stuf=
f?  I do. sf <br>
</div>

<div> <br>
</div>

<div><br>
</div>

#TopText">Attachment(s)</a> from Frank Sumption included below]</span>     =
                  
<div></div>

<div> An Audiovox AM/FM/CD/Cassette I =
got at Good Will a couple months ago.  I just have the cable in to tak=
e over the tuning function, no sweep board yet, I'm manually tuing wiht a 9=
 volt battery and a pot. </div>
 
<div> </div>
 
<div> The video =
starts out "damn it! Why you don't you write your mother" Ooops, must be da=
d, and I do put off writting, I don't write my mother at all. If anyone can=
 hear this, it might be an indication of how good manual sweep works.</div>=

  
<div> </div>
 
<div> F-S</div>
 
<div></div>
